channel.title: Projects on sourque
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on sourque

item.title: coordinate
item.description: Go program to automatically ssh into a specified range of boxes with specified (sets of) creds. This is supposed to be a useful alternative to Metasploit RCs or Ansible, in the context of red teaming for competitions. You can run any scripts with it, and use the “preprocessor” options to control the program execution in ways that would otherwise be cumbersome (ex., run only one of the next three blocks).

item.title: louis
item.description: Linux EDR written in Golang and based on eBPF, work in progress. You can find it at https://github.com/sourque/louis.
